body.name: Cute Personal Mini Fan, Handheld & Portable USB Rechargeable Fan with Beautiful LED Light, 3 Adjustable Speeds, Portable Holder, Perfect for Indoor Or Outdoor Activities, Cute Mouse (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 4 hrs 29 mins
features: ADORABLE MICKEY DESIGN - Cute Mickey mouse design in pink, pleasant blue LED light, an eye-catching mini fan that you can hold in hand perfectly. Good choice for both indoor and outdoor activities. Made of quality ABS material, safe and odor free. Beautiful LED light, Lovely color and kid-friendly design, best gift for your friends or families!

STRONG POWER SOURCE - This fan has a powerful built-in rechargeable battery, which can be used for more than 3000 times. You can charge it with USB cable(included) by connecting it to laptop, phone charger, power bank, solar charger or car charger.

3 SPEED LEVELS - ①Low/medium/high speed level. Adjust appropriate fan speed by pressing the “+” or ”-’ button；②7 fan blades, strong wind, wind distance up to 3m. ③Pure copper motor, which is durable and gives strong power performance.

COMPACT SIZE & PORTABLE - It is the same size as a 6-inch cellphone, taking up minimum space and portable enough to carry in a small bag or wear it on your finger with the fan finger holder (included), very practical for your daily use and travelling.

EXCLUSIVE FINGER LOOP - Finger Ring Holder for your convenience. We are offering the 100% authentic products as described in the pictures! Plus, 24-hour customer service and a 180-day REFUND warranty for any quality issue for your better experience!
body.description: DecoLife is a time-honored brand devoted to home decoration improvement. We have been dedicated to creating practical and beautiful home supplies for over 12 years. Redefine your home life with our quality products. Information: Using Time: 1-2H Charging Time: 2-3H Instruction: Fully charge the product for the first time use. It can be charged by a power bank, computer or phone charger. Easy Control: Press the “+” or “-” button to adjust the wind speed. Long press “+” button for 3 seconds to turn on/off LED light. Warranty: 24 hour customer service and 180-days warranty for quality issue is ready for your convenience. Please contact with our support team if you have any problems during using our product. Tips before use: 1.Fully charge the product for the first time use. It can be charged by a power bank, computer and phone charger. 2.Easy Control: Press the “+” or “-” button to adjust the wind speed. Long press the “+” button for 3 seconds to turn on/off the LED light. FQA: Q: How to turn off the blue light? A: Just long press the “+” button for 3 seconds to turn on/off LED light. We design it in this way to make it easier to control and reduce unnecessary buttons. Q: How to distinguish the battery is fully recharged or not? A: When charging the battery, the fan gives out red light instead of blue light. The red light will turn off automatically if the battery is fully recharged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: I love this little fan! Surprisingly powerful, very small (approx. size of a phone), and lightweight. Something I didn't see anywhere: if you hold the button down, the light goes off which helps conserve battery. My friend and I each got one for a recent Disney trip. Her battery life lasted 4-6 hours of moderate use while mine lasted a full day. Not sure if there was a difference in the product or what, but that was somewhat disappointing. However, it charges quickly, and was not a big problem to use a portable charger or to charge it back at the hotel. At home, I use it for my skincare. Overall, a really good purchase for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is a life saver! I have used it so much! It's large enough to be powerful, but small enough to fit easily in purse or fanny pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this little fan! I wish I knew these existed long ago.. I'm a very hot blooded person and we have very hot summers here and this is fantastic for me to take to church or anywhere I need to if I need to cool off I can use it It's pretty quiet and blows a lot of air for such a little fan. I do wish the charging time did last longer but I do use it a lot so for what it is it works great and I don't know what I did without it before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite park fan
reviews.reviewText: The easiest fan and keeps a good bit of charge. Can go a whole day without charging with nearly constant use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT, SERIOUSLY
reviews.reviewText: I go line dancing about 4 times a week and I will be dancing on the floor for hours. This fan I used last night and it was so powerful that it cooled me off quickly between dances. My friend was like “send me the link” because she loved it too. She ordered it before we even left the bar lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It fits in my pocket, it is very easy to use, it isn’t loud when fanning, super cute, and it has a cool blue light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super cute little fan, powerful, charge doesn’t last too long, but charges quickly with usb. Small, compact, easy to carry & store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Disney Park/summer essentials
reviews.reviewText: I am a plus size girly and I do not enjoy being sweaty. I'm not sure why I didn't buy this sooner. I purchased this for my recent Disneyland trip(Mid August) and it worked great! I used it for majority of the day while I was in and out of the park. I was able to charge it in the car and in our hotel room. My kiddos were able to use it as well and it was very manageable for them. I was able to store it in my fannie pack or diaper bag, purse or stroller. I will be getting another for my kiddos to have there own for our next trip to Disney World.
Me encanta, aunque me llegó en otro color pero me gustó más!
Mon mini ventilateur est parfais il es léger et je l'adore

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent customer service + super cute product
reviews.reviewText: We had an issue with the color of the product sent but the customer service was AMAZING. Quick to respond and very nice, they corrected the issue immediately. We have tried very quickly the product and it is everything we were hoping for. Thanks again !!
Purchased for an up and coming Disney trip so haven’t used for a long period yet. More powerful than expected though and comes with charging cable
